name: Familiar Block Game
description:
Hey this game seems familiar...

Download and play this throw back to the old GameBoy days! Great for a couple quick rounds during a break.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys for movement
  • 'Z' and 'X' for rotation
  • Space to restart after game ending and to select

This game is my first entry into the One Game a Month challenge. I had a late start so I thought "What could I make in 2 weeks at my current skill? Oh I know! I'll make a version of a game that I enjoyed WAY more than the current versions." And thus, this very familiar game was born.
